ISSUE.TITLE: Feature request: Mappings for BigDecimal and BigInteger
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: As an elassandra user i want next mappings(at least without index) should be possible. * **BigDecimal** -> **Keyword** * **BigInteger** -> **Keyword** For example, we have next table: ``` CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS city_budgets ( ...., state text, city text, budget decimal, ..... ) ``` I want to search this table by **city** or **state** fields and result entity should contains **budget** field too.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Add support for Cassandra decimal as Elasticsearch #139
